misc: Operates the Hector organization's digital media properties
Gotten increasingly close to winning the Hector Trophée but hasn't quite gotten it done yet
biography: Lasse, a familiar face from Tapiola Golf, brings a unique perspective to the greens, not only as a competitor but also as the operator behind the Hector organization's digital media properties. His dedication to the sport extends beyond his play, shaping the way fans experience the tournament.

With eight past appearances, Lasse is a seasoned veteran of the Hector Trophée. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have remained just out of reach, his determination is evident each time he tees off. Spectators have noticed how Lasse has been inching ever closer to victory.

As Hector Trophée 2025 approaches, it marks Lasse's ninth appearance in the tournament. With his intimate knowledge of the game and the course, and a steadily growing hunger for the win, Lasse remains one to watch. Perhaps this is the year Lasse finally gets it done.
